name: The Deck Effects
description:
Game made in 1 week for MageJam. The theme was side effect (Efeito Colateral)

Mage is a Gamedev community that you should check it out - http://www.discord.io/mage

Game:

  • Cards can be dragged to the battlefield.
  • Each card has an effect and side effect, you should use carefully.
  • Win all battles to win the game.
  • You can create strategies like: use a card that gives you vampirism but disables the heal card. But there are cards that gives you damage points if your heal is disabled.
  • Cards can be discarded.
  • For each won your max life is increased by 5.
  • Your attack will never be less than 1 point.
  • FYI: Vampirism is an ability that gives you life when you deal some damage.

Assets:

  • Animals and battle background: https://graphicburger.com/icons-set/
